itunes:title: EPISODE 259: Purge Country: Shooting Sprees, Blackouts, Perp-Walks Of The Opposition
title: EPISODE 259: Purge Country: Shooting Sprees, Blackouts, Perp-Walks Of The Opposition
description:
PURGE COUNTRY: America has entered the anarchy phase with rolling brownouts, shooting sprees, and roaming criminals in the streets. Queen Elizabeth II died at the age of 96 after serving for 70 years on the throne in the UK; Poso pays tribute to her commitment to duty and her commitment to honor. Steve Bannon states, “They will never shut me up. They’ll have to kill me first,” as the NY attorney general perp-walked Bannon in front of flashing cameras. Liberal Las Vegas County official Robert Telles was arrested in the murder of investigative reporter Jeff German; but wait, aren’t the MAGA conservatives supposed to be the violent group? While traveling through the JFK Airport in NYC, Poso realized that the TSA confiscated his phone and never returned it; no worries, Poso made the supervisor go through the security footage until the phone was found. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


To get $250 off each 3-month supply of ‘My Patriot Supply’ when you go to PrepareWithPOSO.com, no promo code required
